subject: SQ Pro Racing Simulator Sequential Shifter
description_text:
﻿Hey I bought this shifter 2 months ago and i was really loving it until this spring on the inside broke mid rally. I take of my things and don't abuse them and feel this is a defect. I looked on amazon and your web site for a replacement spring but didn't have and luck finding it. I have attached pictures and a video. But I really hope to hear back from you guys thank you! 

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Goodale,    We have received your feedback and will send you a new improved spring along with a replacement video on Monday. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and will do our best to resolve the issue as soon as possible.

Awesome thank you!! Looking forward to hearing from you on Monday. I have included my information at the bottom of this email

Daniel Goodale
495 cove blvd unit 2D 
Dillon, Colorado , 80435 
970-409-8848
Sent from my iPhone

>
不知道要补发哪些东西，这应该是亚马逊购买的
Hi Daniel Goodale,  Which platform did you purchase from? Could you please provide the order number? We need to check the address

Yep, no problem. I took some screenshots. This should have all the information you need. I ordered it from Amazon.


Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi Daniel Goodale,    Alright, our sales team will arrange to send you a new replacement spring tomorrow, along with a video tutorial for the installation. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Hey, no big deal thanks again I understand and I really appreciate you guys taking care of me. That’s what matters the most to me so Thank you other but than the spring breaking I have truly enjoyed the shifter. It works amazing.



Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Daniel Goodale,  Hi, I am sorry for the inconvenience caused. We have shipped a new spring for you to replace, here is your tracking number: JSEXL2784060347YQ, the shipping carrier is JSEXPRESS.

Hey, I got the spring for the shifter. I didn’t see a piece of paper or anything with a link to the video on how to replace it. Can you help me out with that?

Thanks 
Daniel Goodale
Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi Daniel Goodale,     Please refer to this video for the replacement procedure.       https://drive.google.com/file/d/1KZ9-UnSOB60HUqLPme-ZaiK_l1B2Ix8M/view?usp=sharing     https://drive.google.com/file/d/13W_ew1A3FAz3Yps_6Mdb0tHRVT9rEdk4/view?usp=sharing
